node.html:
I am a Software Developer based in the Bay Area, inspired by a relentless pursuit of innovation. Currently, I am furthering my development expertise through a Master's Degree program in Computer Software Engineering at San Jose State University.

Previously, I honed my development skills at Deloitte for two years, where I specialized in end-to-end app development & efficient fine-tuning of Large Language Models. Beyond my professional pursuits, I engage in the art of writing on Medium and I channel my creativity into the realms of filmmaking and photography when I'm not in front of a screen.

Deloitte AI Studios

  • Built a conversational chatbot called Virtual Coach fed with skill gap analysis to help new hires with career growth.

  • Implemented a combination of in-context learning and prompt chaining to reduce compute load while maintaining data privacy with anonymization using Microsoft Presidio.

  • Press Ctrl+End on my Profile to view the Recommendations

Deloitte Digital

  • Received Applause Award twice.

  • Developed and maintained expanding feature sets (in native Android) leveraging large-scale distributed systems to orchestrate inventory management and package movement in 2700+ retail warehouses, used by more than a hundred thousand store associates for Kroger.

  • Led the production of 4 domain-driven microservices to employ a smart pricing tool called Retail Insight that discounts retail products from an individual item to a huge variety of product ranges driving significant margin improvements ($150M bottomline ROI).

  • Delivered a modular application with clean architecture (MVVM) using ViewModels for lifecycle awareness, achieved IOC by using Koin for dependency injection, RoomDB to present purposeful data from API responses using SQLite, observed active-states using LiveData.

  • Migrated all capabilities’ codebase from a traditional MVP architecture (Java) to its current framework in Kotlin. Rewrote all UI modules using Jetpack Compose (from XML) in just over two well planned hyper-sprints to reduce tech debt & save on man hours.

  • Automated triggers to remediate workflow, ingestion of metrics, traces and continuous dependency mapping by facilitating in-depth logging with dynatrace. Mentored associate developers carry out JUnit/Integration/E2E testing.

• Awarded ‘Best Employee 2021’ for early deliveries.

  • Maintained an outsourced service to keep up with the rapidly expanding content library of MX Player ~ 10M concurrent users. Handled aggregation of services and improved client load times by 50% in 10% of user-base.

  • Developed a middle-layer using BFF design pattern rendering each service instance to initially handle 1k+ requests per minute on custom load-testing infrastructure; proved out the service on fastify framework by landing a configuration for socket timeouts & heap memory.

  • Built upon the in-house expertise on NodeJS by leveraging node streams to allow each instance higher memory and time efficiency rate.

  • Successfully included server-side pagination and filtering for a complex tree model which optimized one of the features by 85%.

  • View Recommendation.

• Led a team of 12 Internship coordinators and 3 Placement coordinators to streamline the career fair processes at the Career Development Center.

  • Student Point of Contact (sPOC) for multiple Fortune® 50 companies (Amazon, Uber, Target etc).

  • Eliminated plagiarism in Online Assesments (OA) by developing a secondary-invigilation application to proctor test-takers.

  • Made using the MEAN stack.

• Research project focusing on distributed federated learning under the supervision of Prof. K. Chandrasekaran at the National Insititute Of Technology Karnataka.

  • Developed a collaborative blockchain application for distributed training of AI models by a reward-based mechanism to allow for the voting for the most robust model. Built using lenet-5 CNN, truffle, ganache & metamask.

  • My main contribution was building simulators to test the robustness of our blockchain framework, which combined traditional decentralization benefits with high efficiency in federated learning.

  • Our quorum-based system allows research organizations to perform model aggregation and turn the distributed ledger into a proof of contribution, thus maintaining data privacy. By training on four nodes using the MNIST dataset and LeNet5 CNN we achieved 95 percent training accuracy with no overhead.

  • View the codebase

frontmatter.title: JobSearchHub: A Powerful Indeed Clone
tech: Frontend -> React.js, Redux, Bootstrap, Material UI
AWS -> Autoscaling, Load balancing, EC2, S3, RDS

node.html:
Designed a 3-tier distributed application to implement the functionalities of Indeed website like post jobs, apply for jobs, reveal salaries, writing reviews anonymously

Manage entities like Jobseeker, employer and admin user.

Contributed in development of internal microservices to manage multi-part data(files, photos), reviews, and chat.

Ensured high availability by implementing Kafka messaging queues to buffer the request in case of a system failure.

Reduced the latency on API requests by 10% through caching, alongside added message broker(Kafka) to achieve scalability and reliability.

I developed an “UberEats Application Prototype” by managing two personas, namely Customers and Restaurants. It allows the following features:

For Customers:

👤 Manage Profiles

🍔 Search Restaurants  

🏢 View Restaurant Profile  

🍽️ Filter Food Preferences  

🛒 Add Items to Cart  

📦 Place an Order  

📋 View Orders  

For Restaurants:

🏪 Handle Profiles  

📑 Add/Edit Dishes Menu  

📋 View Orders  

👤 View User Profile  

🚚 Update Delivery Status

frontmatter.title: Agile Brews: Building Starbucks
tech: Java, JSP, JavaScript, Html5, CSS, Bootstrap
AWS - Elastic Beanstalk, RDS, IAM, ELB, S3

node.html:
This Portfolio Project reflects my proficiency in web development, including front-end and back-end technologies, user authentication, payment processing, and user interface design. It demonstrates my commitment to creating user-friendly, secure, and feature-rich web applications.

Here are the key features I've implemented:

🌟 Join Now

🔐 Authentication

💳 Add Card

☕ Place Orders

💲 Payment

🚪 Sign Out
My inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hello, I'll try my best to get back to you! Feel free to mail me about any relevant job updates.
